game_meta.title: Duke Blue Devils at California Golden Bears

weather.notes: Cool, light wind; minimal weather impact

hype_factors: Duke’s first West Coast game in 13 years

home.name: California Golden Bears
home.recent_form: Won 4 of last 5; defense trending strong

away.name: Duke Blue Devils
away.recent_form: Won 3 of last 5; offense ~472 ypg, 34.8 ppg

matchup_history.recent_trend: Only two prior meetings; Duke unbeaten (1-0-1)

spread.line_movement: moved toward away by ~1 point (touching -3 at times)

odds.consensus_note: Market opened Duke -1.5/56.5; now -2.5 to -3 and 54.5–55.5 with public stacked on Duke

key_trends: CAL is 3-2 ATS; UNDER 4 of last 5 CAL games
DUKE is 2-3 ATS; 3-0 SU as favorite this season
Public ~89% on DUKE spread; contrarian home dog spot
situational_spots: Body-clock edge for CAL (10:30 p.m. ET kick)
Duke cross-country travel on late window

moneyline.rationale: Home dog with improving defense; market and public tilted to DUKE

spread.rationale: Key number +3 appears; fade public road fave

total.rationale: CAL trend to UNDER; defensive injuries but pace/late window favors lower scoring

best_bet.rationale: Contrarian home dog with late-window dynamics

injuries_news: CAL OLB Ryan McCulloch out for season
CAL DB Isaiah Crosby out for season
matchup_notes: CAL defense ranks well in ACC scoring defense; limiting explosives
Duke offense producing ~35 ppg; explosive pass game vs CAL secondary depth
coaching_notes: Justin Wilcox’s defenses typically solid at home
Manny Diaz brings aggressive front; travel and depth at LB are factors

excitement_factors.playoff_implications: Low playoff impact; bowl/ACC standing relevance
excitement_factors.narrative: Coast-to-coast clash; rising CAL vs favored DUKE
tv_storylines: Freshman QB JKS vs ACC defense
Duke’s 2-0 ACC start tested on road

sources.label: Write For California – How to watch
